description:
Djeco Golfy Marbles Game lets you construct your own marble golf course.

 Comes with 14 plastic pieces which kids can arrange to create an exciting obstacle round game. The game can be set up in moments and is great for indoor and outdoor use - simply place the pieces together and get playing! Includes a handy storage bag for easy tidy-up and carrying. Kids will develop spatial awareness as they work out how to put the pieces together to set up the game.

 Educational Benefits of Djeco Golfy Marbles Game

  
 * Spatial Awareness. 
 * Hand-To-Eye Coordination. 
 * Gross Motor Skills. 
 * Screen-Free Play.  Contains:

  
 * 14 plastic pieces. 
 * 10 marbles. 
 * 1 bag (fabric).  Box Size: 30 x 28 x 9cm.

 For 1 to 6 players.

 Ages 7 - 12.

description: A toy that grows as you do! This My First Clock is the perfect learning aid for children from 4 years upwards – it starts out as a learning toy for telling the time, and morphs into your very own alarm clock! There are multiple dials included which increase in difficulty from simply showing the time of the day to a full clock face making this suitable for all abilities. Also included are 50 double sided quiz cards to be matched up either to the clock face or digitally. Once you’ve made your guess, simply lift the flap to check your answer! Perfect for children from 4 years of age! Included : 1 clock, 8x clock faces, 100 questions and answers. Requires 1 LR06-AA battery not included. Batteries are to be changed by an adult.

description:
A creative kit for making a large, solar system-themed decorative mobile. Children paint the planets and stars with the 8 gouache colours. Once dry, they slide them over the wire to create rings, following the position of the planets in the solar system. All that’s left to do is fix the rings to the pre-punched stand and add the other decorative elements (rockets, comets, stars, etc.). An illustrated booklet is also provided, helping children to learn more about the solar system. A perfect product for learning about the planets in our solar system and seeing them in all their glory!

  A comprehensive and easy creative kit: all the material is included and detailed step-by-step instructions provided.
 A mobile with metallic detailing for a shiny finish.
 Made of FSC® certified paper and cardboard.

 Contents: 1 illustrated cardboard stand, 5 pre-cut sheets of 8 planets and 3 stars to paint, 2 pre-cut sheets of decorative elements (rockets, stars, comets), 1 palette of gouache paints (8 colours), 1 brush, 10 m of nylon thread, 1 self-adhesive hook, 1 double-sided sheet of stickers, 1 set of instructions and 1 booklet on the planets and solar system.

 Age 7+

description:
A creative kit for making a large, solar system-themed decorative mobile. Children paint the planets and stars with the 8 gouache colours. Once dry, they slide them over the wire to create rings, following the position of the planets in the solar system. All that’s left to do is fix the rings to the pre-punched stand and add the other decorative elements (rockets, comets, stars, etc.). An illustrated booklet is also provided, helping children to learn more about the solar system. A perfect product for learning about the planets in our solar system and seeing them in all their glory!
